basics.name: Teodor Neagoe
basics.label: Software Engineer | Student | Founder
basics.summary: Software Engineer with experience in production app development (Uber internship; Recollect CTO; YellowDocs Technical Co-Founder), robotics (RoboCup participant), and AI-driven systems (honours research at TU Delft; Ekkie.ai founding-engineer)

courses: Quantum Science and Quantum Information Minor
Honours research: Value Alignment in LLM Responses
OOP Project: Full-stack expense splitter (Spring Boot, JavaFX
Ray tracer in C++ with OpenGL
Interpreter with desugarer and type checker in Scala
Quantum Engineering Project: Implemented Two Semi-Quantum kNN Algorithms with Python (Qiskit)

work.name: Ekkie.ai
highlights: Rebuilt the dispatcher (1 of 3 products sold to customers) from 0 in Python within the first 2 weeks
Designing & building the new deterministic engine using Spring Boot Kotlin (previously implemented in Python)
Working with Autotask, Topdesk, and the Azure suite (Graph API, SQL, Language Server, Blob Storage, ...)
Tech stack: Kotlin (Spring Boot), Python (Microsoft Agent Framework) TypeScript (Next.js)

work.name: YellowDocs.com
highlights: B2B SaaS startup for Health & Safety Compliance
Secured 2 paying customers within the first 2 months (both interested in investing)
Implemented tenancy management with Supabase RLS
Developed both Web & mobile UI
Tech stack: Supabase, TypeScript (React + Vite)

work.name: Uber
highlights: Designed and implemented an internal tool to simplify data retrieval for our team; built endpoints and frontend
Re-designed and implemented ui routing (for our team products's) to support scalable deployment across multiple UI versions
Onboarded the team to a new observability tool, improving monitoring and debugging capabilities for our product with funneling
Tech stack: Go (Fx), TypeScript (React + Fusion.js), Protobuf, Phabricator, nginx

work.name: WTSS
highlights: As part of team of 5 students, we created a proof of concept arhitecture from the ground up for their whole software
Built a code generation platform for e2e tests for  Playwright, Appium, and API testing
Tech stack: Java (Spring Boot), TypeScript (React), Playwright, Appium, Docker

work.name: Recollect
highlights: Designed & built photo journaling app
Shipped Android & iOS app
Tech stack: Dart (Flutter), Firebase

work.name: Delft University of Technology
highlights: Assisted students in Modelling 2A (AM2050-A TWN) laboratories
Assisted students in Computational Practicum (CH3133)

work.name: Delft Mercurians - Tu Delft's RoboCup Team
highlights: Built a Rust-based physics simulator using Bevy and Rapier

publications.name: How Expert Consultation Affects Creativity: The Role of Expert Input in Early Stage Innovation
publications.publisher: CIJ (CERN IdeaSquare Journal of Experimental Innovation)
publications.summary: I participated in the TU Delft CERN IdeaSquare Summer School as part of my Honours programe, and then I've wrote this paper with my team
